name: Decade Luna Online Plus
description:
Hi.. Dear D'lunatic, We will show you how to register and install Decade luna plus online.

If you are new player you need create new account so please follow this steps carefully.

REGISTRATION GUIDE

- Go to registration page HERE

- Fill in all required data.

Username : Your ID to login website and game

Password : Your password

Re-type Password : Re-type your password

Email : Use Valid email

Real Name : Your real name

Gender : Male or Female

Birth date : Day - Month - Year

Address : Your address

Unique Key : Use unique key/number you can remember

Captcha : Write text/number shown on picture

- Recheck to make sure your data is correct and then press "Register"

- It will auto send activation code to your email, plaese check inbox or spam in your email.

* If you use Yahoo mail, you should copy and paste activation code to your browser.

* if you use Google mail, you can click the code link to activation your account.

CAUTION:

If your activation code not shown into your inbox or spam folder please try to RESENDactivation code. But if you are trying to resend and it still not shown please contact us HERE.

If all ways above failed, please use manual validation.

Send Email to Jeffryfrancisco(@)gmail.com

Format:

Subject: Validation
ID/Username: .......

Note:
You should send an email from an account that is registered, to ensure that email is still valid and has not been used to register another ID.

VIDEO GUIDE HOW TO REGISTER
